description: This file implements a Flutter widget for a login and registration screen in a chess application, handling user input, authentication actions, and UI state management.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget providing login and registration UI for the app.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: The mutable state for LoginScreen, managing form input, UI state, and submission logic.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form submission; performs validation, calls provided login/register functions, manages loading and error state.
